title: I believe my ban was wrong
body:
This was the first time I was perma banned and I truly did mean everything I said.
-https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/8TNVTnip-thanks-for-the-perma-ban

Game 1
For context I was xerath
In-Game
StaySaltyBaby: ok no conq mord
StaySaltyBaby: wtf
StaySaltyBaby: conq is op on him
-Here I just said conq is good on morde. Not bannable.
StaySaltyBaby: he has no flash
StaySaltyBaby: HOW WAS THAT MY FAULT
StaySaltyBaby: HOW ALL MY ABILITES WERE ON COOLDOWN
StaySaltyBaby: I HIT HIM WITH E
StaySaltyBaby: ALL I CAN DO
-Kindred complained and spammed pinged with "?"
StaySaltyBaby: HOW
StaySaltyBaby: DID YOU LOSE
StaySaltyBaby: BUT KANYE HAS ARCANE
StaySaltyBaby: sure get ur acc banned
StaySaltyBaby: "I ALWAYS WIN WITH GRASP"
-Ill admit I mocked him with "I ALWAYS WIN WITH GRASP", but I didnt say anything bannable.
StaySaltyBaby: u lost  to kayn TOP with arcane
-Unless saying "sure get ur acc banned" when he said he will int is bannable ok.
StaySaltyBaby: bruh morde
StaySaltyBaby: we dont care
-Morde kept saying he is gonna int we didnt care cause it was 17-35 and we had no towers. Also their hec with conq was 7-1 and just destroying us.
StaySaltyBaby: I DODGED TWO W"S
StaySaltyBaby: BRUH U DONT DODGE SHIT
StaySaltyBaby: U GOT HIT BY ALL HIS W"S
StaySaltyBaby: NEVER PLAY THIS GAME AGAIN
StaySaltyBaby: U ARENT GOOD
-Morde kept pinging and said "Lol dude you cant beat kayn top with arcane haha" so I just said he isnt good and not to play again, also said he cant dodge skillshots.
StaySaltyBaby: report mord toxic
StaySaltyBaby: u said u wanted hang urself saying u will int if i dont shut up
-For context MORDE SAID THIS, I said this is in all chat with "report mord toxic" so giving a reason why to report a toxic by quoting what he said is bannable?
StaySaltyBaby: WHY VOTE NO
StaySaltyBaby: dude if morde doesnt get banned
-Morde did say all that and yeah ^
StaySaltyBaby: KILL VAYNE
StaySaltyBaby: SHE JUST H AS GA
StaySaltyBaby: whatever
StaySaltyBaby: jst ff pls
StaySaltyBaby: check my match history
StaySaltyBaby: ohoho
StaySaltyBaby: i was hard camped
-Soraka complained saying I was trying to hard int and I wasn't I was just playing really bad ill admit it. I was not trying to int I was just trying to do dmg for my team but I couldnt do any dmg.
StaySaltyBaby: hec just went behind my tower pressed r
StaySaltyBaby: and i died
StaySaltyBaby: I WAS TOWER
StaySaltyBaby: AND DIED THEIR 5 times
-Soraka complained again and I gave her reason wrong or right not a offense.
StaySaltyBaby: just report morde pks
Game 2 
For context Pyke is my irl friend and I have at least 600 or so games with my two accs StaySaltyBaby and SaltyBoiMalum. 
Also my mic was broken so the only way I could communicate was in league chat. Also why I sounded like a complete douche when I flamed him this game. I mean we flame each other in discord way worse, but at the end of the day we still are bros and no hard feelings. Its just dudes flaming each other as a joke. Like I dont actually mean hes trash ive seen him when he plays good (a lot) im just mocking his play/s.
Also im xerath this game, we have a tris, pyke, Kha (I think), and yorick.
Enemy team had garen and fizz, im unsure about jg and bot lane.
In-Game
StaySaltyBaby: WHY TF
StaySaltyBaby: IS BOTLANE AT TOWER
StaySaltyBaby: GO TO RED
StaySaltyBaby: or just let mid die
StaySaltyBaby: dumbass

StaySaltyBaby: what?
StaySaltyBaby: ALSO

The enemy mf had like manamune and deaths dance and like executioners calling. I just called him out on his build. We didnt say anything to each before that or after that. It was in a joking way aswell

StaySaltyBaby: DEFEND

StaySaltyBaby: worst jg na

StaySaltyBaby: THANKS
StaySaltyBaby: PUSH EM AWAY FROM ME
Pyke pulled them out of my q w with his q and yes I used push instead of pull like a pepega.
StaySaltyBaby: im litterally the nly person doing anything rn
StaySaltyBaby: also spicy stfu

Pyke flamed me (again we do this in a joking way)
StaySaltyBaby: TRIS ur useless
StaySaltyBaby: u dont do anything
StaySaltyBaby: and u dont know how to play ur champ
StaySaltyBaby: u dont do dmg
-Tris was saying I cant do anything to change the game and im useless. At this point in the game I could kill their adc with e q or w q.
StaySaltyBaby: well im full build
StaySaltyBaby: dont take blue
StaySaltyBaby: i need it
StaySaltyBaby: do u want to lose the game
StaySaltyBaby: u morons
StaySaltyBaby: im the only one doing dmg
Tris and Kha went and took blue as I was right next to them or at least in range to kill it with q.
StaySaltyBaby: I ONE SHOT THEIR TANKS
StaySaltyBaby: WHY WOULD U Q HIM TO ME
StaySaltyBaby: WTF IS WRONG WITH U
StaySaltyBaby: gg
StaySaltyBaby: SEAN U FUCKNG PULLED HIM ON ME
-Pyke pulled garen on me and he r'd also his name is not Sean he just looks like Sean the sheep and its a inside joke we have with our friend group.
StaySaltyBaby: no u didnt
-Pyke he said that he actually pushed him away from me.
StaySaltyBaby: of course im toxic
StaySaltyBaby: im playing with monkeys on my team
-Tris was saying im toxic and ill admit I was toxic, but didnt actually say anything toxic to anyone and I was joking about what I said to pyke and he was too.
StaySaltyBaby: okay prove it
StaySaltyBaby: get a triple
StaySaltyBaby: show me ur worth
-Tris was saying she know how to play her champ and that she can carry and I told her to prove it.
StaySaltyBaby: end the game
StaySaltyBaby: all mid
StaySaltyBaby: gj team for once
StaySaltyBaby: (:
-We won the game and I sent a joke which made Tris the only person that we actually had a little argument, but we were not flaming each other send a "lol u too" or just "lol" Im not sure.
Post-Game
StaySaltyBaby: lol
StaySaltyBaby: at 94
StaySaltyBaby: gg
StaySaltyBaby: 1 honor ):
StaySaltyBaby: ty (:
-Tris honored me "For staying cool" and we even friended each other (I think I just remember friending a lot of people these last few days), but we didnt que together cause I just went to bed.
If u guys wanna veirfy that I was joking around with Pyke just msg Stay Spicy, again a good friend of mine irl.
Edit: I dont think riot would ban me for calling one person a bitch and nothing else, that is litterally the only thing that I cannot defend myself. These are the two games where I was BANNED for. Telling people they are bad, but not arguing or getting angry. I told the enemy mf that her build was questionable, I told my morde "I NEVER LOSE WITH GRASP" in a mocking way. I didnt tell anyone they are playing like dogshit, I told my friend who we both knew was in a joking way. I called out the fizz being scared a "bitch" because he only went in with r and jg. No one told me to shutup or to stop flaming infact they did the opposite the mord started threatening to int if I didnt shutup. So I did and he still inted. Then I said to report him for being toxic. When I jokingly flamed my friend not a single person told me to shutup or be quiet.

replies.body:
Holy typing.

Deserved.

I have no way to communicate to my team mates and my friend in discord.
Edit: except for typing
Sometimes, less is more.
Depends, but not in a game where helping your team is super important to winning hence typing.
Flaming and arguing not only isn't "super important", it doesn't help your team win.
I was not flaming or arguing with my team mates. I was just jokin around with a friend of mine irl who I couldnt talk to since my mic was broken.

Nobody in the game knows you're friends with the other person, they don't know it's joking.

As far as your other teammates (and the enemies, if it was in all chat) were concerned, you were being negative and toxic.

When you are utilizing the public chat, you don't get the benefits of private communication with your friend, and you must follow the rules.

So saying "SEAN U FUCKNG PULLED HIM ON ME" shows that I know nothing about this player. I did not say anything in all chat except for saying "wtf is ur build mf"
Edit: Also they cant report me during the game unless they want to go afk to submit a support ticket which no one did, so when or if they did report me they knew I knew this person irl.

People tell each other their names on League. It's still public chat. You must follow the rules within public chat.

Keep in mind you would not have been punished had nobody reported you. Obviously, someone on your team was not okay with you using public chat for this sort of thing - and that's why you were punished.

So they knew we were duoed. Litterally have similar names and flavors hence StaySaltyBaby and Stay Spicy. So either I paid real life money to change my name similar to someone in a video game who is a stranger or made an account and leveled it all the level 81 to flame someone who just happens to have a similar name. Also I dont know why someone would give me their name unless they considered me their friend, do you gave your name to random people in league?Also its riots decision if I get banned not my team mates or enemies. Riot knows how many games ive played with this person on both of my accs.

Yes, it is Riot's decision. Riot's decision is that it's not okay to ruin another player's experience, even if you are talking to a friend. If you're using the public chat, you're subjected to the rules of using the in game chat.
If my friend said he didnt want to joke around I would have stopped, and since he didnt report me I ovbiously did not "ruin" his experience.
The game consists of more than YOU and YOUR FRIEND. There are 8 other people in the game who don't want to be annoyed for 45 minutes.

> edit: also annoying players is not ban worthy verbally abusing or being toxic is ban worthy.

Yes it is. Dude, you've been banned before and you didn't learn your lesson. Anything that **derails the game for other people** is punishable. End of story.

> [{quoted}](name=GatekeeperTDS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EIa1GKn9,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-07-20T02:22:59.028+0000)
>
> Yes it is. Dude, you've been banned before and you didn't learn your lesson. Anything that **derails the game for other people** is punishable. End of story.

No one told me to shut up except for morde and I did, but he still inted so I wrote one thing "report morde for being toxic"

When you are in a private settings like discord where only you and your friend(s) have to listen/read the chat, sure, you should be able to say or type whatever you want.  But the team chat is for the team, not just for the 2 of you.  It's not a social public chat.  It's the middle of the game.  For all your team knows, you are flaming each other and that reduces the team's chance to win for them, "ruin" their experience.

> StaySaltyBaby: of course im toxic
> StaySaltyBaby: im playing with monkeys on my team

Impling your team are monkeys sure does not endear you to them and increases your chance of getting reported.

No.  Report triggers a review.  If your chat is clean (it is not), then the report(s) are considered invalid and nothing will happen to your account.  If your chat consists of toxicity (it does), then you will be issued a punishment based on your account toxicity history.  You've already moved up past the 14-day ban so this next punishment is a perma-ban.

It's not so much this chat log got you banned.  It's this chat log AND the string of toxicity that lead you to your last 14-day ban that got your perma.

You did not follow the rules.

The rules do not say "it's ok if you know them". The rules say it's prohibited, period, no matter what.

The players are not obligated to publicly announce in the public chat that they will report anyone. They could have been private messaging each other, "Let's report this guy" or they could have been playing side by side in the real world and say to each other, "Let's report him". We don't know. The fact is, you got reported, RIOT investigated, and they found the reports legit. EOS.

> [{quoted}](name=StaySaltyBaby,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EIa1GKn9,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000030004,timestamp=2019-07-20T03:49:53.029+0000)
>
> Tell me what I got banned for, you are not helping me at all. Not a single person has actual showed me something from the summoners rule of conduct or whatever it is called. Saying "hes toxic" is no better than a report.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player

> Do not ask other players in the match to report the offending player. It only takes one report for our systems to review a game. Additional reports will not do anything for the offending player; however as mentioned above, it could open yourself up to a report of your own; especially if you are derailing the match by constantly demanding reports of other players.

This is in addition to all the other toxicity, abuse, and harassment you displayed, but an account that's had a 14-day suspension is on "thin ice" and can easily be permabanned with even a single instance of poor behavior. You were lucky not to get a permaban for Game 1 alone.

> [{quoted}](name=StaySaltyBaby,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EIa1GKn9,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000030006,timestamp=2019-07-20T04:15:41.064+0000)
>
> They dont say its not, and again I wasnt harassing or insulting to him because a joke friends make jokes about each other in a joking way because its funny. No one told to stop joking about him in this game or my previous.

I dunno, sounds kinda like "the law says it's illegal to steal, but it says nothing about taking something from your buddy without asking" you know? It's possible someone reported it anyway, and by literal definition flaming is bannable even if you didn't mean anything serious by it.

> [{quoted}](name=StaySaltyBaby,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EIa1GKn9,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000030003,timestamp=2019-07-20T03:45:00.655+0000)
>
> The rules say I should not harass players, not a single one told me to shut up except for morde and he said If I didnt shut up he would feed, and he did, but I did not type anything before he fed. Telling people to report someone for doing something is punishable if its a lie. He delibertaliy fed and inted the game and the enemy for gold and xp. So I said report mord for being toxic which he was.
> Tell me one rule I broke -https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/9EVf5ytF-rule-clarification-for-the-punishment-system-in-league-of-legends?show=flat

No, calling for reports is **always** against the rules. It does not matter if it's the "truth". Furthermore, the rules don't say harassing/insulting is okay if it's your friend. The rules say it's prohibited, period. So even though it was your friend, it's not acceptable in public game chat.

> [{quoted}](name=Zero Shingetsu,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EIa1GKn9,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000030007,timestamp=2019-07-20T04:19:06.546+0000)

I wasnt flaming I was joking with a friend and we were having a good time and the only time I was negative was in my first game when I saw morde int.

If your chat consists of toxicity (it does), then you will be issued a punishment based on your account toxicity history.  You've already moved up past the 14-day ban so this next punishment is a perma-ban.
> 
> It's not so much this chat log got you banned.  It's this chat log AND the string of toxicity that lead you to your last 14-day ban that got your perma.

Tell me what I got banned for, you are not helping me at all. Not a single person has actual showed me something from the summoners rule of conduct or whatever it is called. Saying "hes toxic" is no better than a report.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EIa1GKn9,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000030005,timestamp=2019-07-20T04:07:48.422+0000)

They dont say its not, and again I wasnt harassing or insulting to him because a joke friends make jokes about each other in a joking way because its funny. No one told to stop joking about him in this game or my previous.
So reports get me banned?? So if I followed the rules which I did id still get banned.
There are more players than just you and your friend in the game. _Someone_ reported you, so even if you didn't ruin your friend's experience, you still ruined someone else's.
You were not talking to your friend, you were talking to the team chat.

> [{quoted}](name=StaySaltyBaby,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EIa1GKn9,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000020000,timestamp=2019-07-20T01:11:44.307+0000)
>
> Their is no other way for me to talk unless I go afk and I cant alt tab or shift ~ to discord because my laptop is bad.

You can use the /msg  feature to message them in private. If you are using the public game chat, you are subject to the public game chat rules.
Their is no other way for me to talk unless I go afk and I cant alt tab or shift ~ to discord because my laptop is bad.

Why in the living shit are you lying when your chat logs are right up there?

> StaySaltyBaby: of course im toxic
StaySaltyBaby: im playing with monkeys on my team
-Tris was saying im toxic and ill admit I was toxic, but didnt actually say anything toxic to anyone and I was joking about what I said to pyke and he was too.
In that game I was toxic, but I didnt write anything down.
It litterally says I didnt say anything toxic to anyone.
Pretty sure telling people they aren’t good and to not play, asking for reports for others, and repeatedly insulting your team counts as verbal abuse....

Said that ONCE to a team mate who was actually flaming me, and asking to report a person whos actually inting my game and ruining the experience for 4 other players is a bad thing. Also the only person I "verbally abused" was Pyke and we were joking around.

Unless I’m mistaken, Riot doesn’t care about what anyone else said in regards to you. I’m not saying I think banning others who flame is a bad thing, but 2 wrongs don’t make a right.

Also you were definitely saying shit to Trist and Fizz...
I told her she was useless because she does no dmg, and I called out fizz for being scared till his ult is up.
Again, I don’t think they care about context. Don’t know what to tell you, except type less.
Would there be anyway to revoke the perma ban and substitue it with a perma mute?
I’m the wrong person to ask. AFAIK no, but try talking to Riot support. Wouldn’t expect them to do anything like that, but you don’t lose anything by trying.
Also let the record state his "toxicity" didn't ruin my experience of the game
The game consists of more than YOU and YOUR FRIEND. There are 8 other people in the game who don't want to be annoyed for 45 minutes.

1. There are 3 other people on your team
2. Just because toxic behavior doesn’t affect someone doesn’t make it any less toxic

> [{quoted}](name=High Lord Blaze,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EIa1GKn9,comment-id=000100000000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-07-20T02:17:56.991+0000)
>
> 1. There are 3 other people on your team
> 2. Just because toxic behavior doesn’t affect someone doesn’t make it any less toxic

Dude I didnt know I was affecting other players cause no one said anything except for the morde who just inted and THEN I said "report morde for being toxic".

They don't have to say anything. The onus is on you to follow the rules - not on them to tell you you're breaking them. They are perfectly within their right to mute you and not interact with you further.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EIa1GKn9,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2019-07-20T04:08:30.241+0000)
>
> They don't have to say anything. The onus is on you to follow the rules - not on them to tell you you're breaking them. They are perfectly within their right to mute you and not interact with you further.

Your last sentence isnt even needed. I wasnt verbally abusing cause no one told me to stop. I would have stopped if I had known a player did not like it, who knows they may have even enjoyed it. So maybe they accidentally reported me instead of morde. Who knows?

To your teammates, it appeared as if you were verbally abusing your friend. It does not matter that your friend was okay with it. Someone on your team was not, and the onus is on you to use public chat within the rules. They do not have to tell you that they're uncomfortable or not okay with what you're saying/doing - the obligation is on you to not violate the rules of the game.

It further does not matter who reported you - someone did, and you were violating the rules, thus you were punished.

> [{quoted}](name=StaySaltyBaby,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EIa1GKn9,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-07-20T04:48:09.944+0000)
>
> Appears and actually doing it are two different things. No one told me to stop so I didnt violate.

No. Wrong. Completely wrong.

If nobody tells you "stop murdering that guy" it's still against the law.

You violated the rules, period. Whether you accept it or not, that's the truth. Period. Full stop. You are free to believe otherwise, but you'll just end up getting more punishments because your ignorance will cause you to break the rules further.

Have a nice day.

Riot doesn't employ permanent chat mutes. They tried something similar before, and it simply resulted in an increase in toxic players trolling or intentionally feeding for lack of being able to spread their toxicity in chat.

Once a player reaches the point of a permanent ban, that account is gone - unless the ban was applied in error, but for the largest part, that isn't the case.
There isnt anyway to work this out?
